scripts.test:jasmine: export TMP_PROFILE=$(mktemp -d -p /tmp chrome-profile-XXXXXX); CHROME_BIN=$(which google-chrome-stable); jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs --browser=chrome --capabilities.chromeOptions.args='["--headless=new","--no-sandbox","--disable-gpu","--disable-dev-shm-usage","--user-data-dir='$TMP_PROFILE'","--profile-directory=Profile'$(date +%s%N)'","--remote-debugging-port=9222"]'
